mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNPROXYINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROXY_NM LIKE '%'||#{strProxyNm}||'%'

SELECT A.PROXY_ID, A.PROXY_NM, A.PROXY_IP, A.PROXY_PORT, A.TRGET_SVC_NM, A.SVC_DC, A.SVC_IP, A.SVC_PORT, A.SVC_STTUS, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND CODE = A.SVC_STTUS) AS SVC_STTUS_NM, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNPROXYINFO A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PROXY_ID = #{proxyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNPROXYINFO (PROXY_ID, PROXY_NM, PROXY_IP, PROXY_PORT, TRGET_SVC_NM, SVC_DC, SVC_IP, SVC_PORT, SVC_STTUS, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{proxyId}, #{proxyNm}, #{proxyIp}, #{proxyPort}, #{trgetSvcNm}, #{svcDc}, #{svcIp}, #{svcPort}, #{svcSttus}, SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATETIME, #{lastUpdusrId})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNPROXYINFO SET PROXY_NM = #{proxyNm}, PROXY_IP = #{proxyIp}, PROXY_PORT = #{proxyPort}, TRGET_SVC_NM = #{trgetSvcNm}, SVC_DC = #{svcDc}, SVC_IP = #{svcIp}, SVC_PORT = #{svcPort}, SVC_STTUS = #{svcSttus}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE PROXY_ID = #{proxyId}
